amount_spent <- c(9.1,8.55,14.32,14.17,14.34,7.97,9.79,11.47,12.44)

              "Lunch", "Lunch", "Dinner")

my_week_of_spending <- tibble(amount_spent, spending_category = category)

my_week_of_spending %>% 
summarise(sum(amount_spent))

          sum(amount_spent)
          )
